titles: Vitis Palatina A sermon appointed to be preached at VVhitehall vpon the Tuesday after the mariage of the Ladie Elizabeth her Grace. By the B. of London.
author: King, John, 1559?-1621.
publisher: Printed [by Eliot's Court Press] for Iohn Bill,
notes: The B. of London = John King.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "[par.]".
Identified as STC 14991 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
